CustomField.description: Unique 11-digit identifier defined by the US Postal Service used to address mail for this business location. Postal discounts may be available to direct-mail marketers who print a Delivery Point BarCode on their mail.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Unique 11-digit identifier defined by the US Postal Service used to address mail for this business location. Postal discounts may be available to direct-mail marketers who print a Delivery Point BarCode on their mail.
CustomField.label: Delivery Point BarCode
